bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Specifications for High-Voltage (>1000 V) Distribution Class Current-Limiting Type Fuses and Fuse Disconnecting Switches
Redline
IEEE Standard Specifications for High-Voltage (>1000 V) Distribution Class Current-Limiting Type Fuses and Fuse Disconnecting Switches - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Specifications for high-voltage (>1000 V) distribution class current-limiting fuses and fuse disconnecting switches, and associated accessories for these devices, are covered. All of these devices are intended for use on alternating-current distribution systems. (Superseded by IEEE C37.42-2016)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
